 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_TRANSPOSE_MAP_DECL_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_TRANSPOSE_MAP_DECL_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/core/view_fwd.hpp>
 18
 19
 20
 21/***********************************************************************
 22  Declarations & Class Definitions
 23***********************************************************************/
 24
 25namespace vsip
 26{
 27namespace impl
 28{
 29
 30template <typename MapT>
 31class Transpose_map
 32{
 33  // Translate tranpose dimension to parent map dimension.
 34  dimension_type parent_dim(dimension_type dim)
 35  {
 36    return (dim == 0) ? 1 : (dim == 1) ? 0 : dim;
 37  }
 38  // Compile-time typedefs.
 39public:
 40  static dimension_type const Dim = 2;
 41  typedef typename MapT::processor_iterator processor_iterator;
 42  typedef typename MapT::impl_pvec_type     impl_pvec_type;
 43
 44  // Constructor.
 45public:
 46  Transpose_map(MapT const& map)
 47    : map_(map)
 48  {}
 49
 50  ~Transpose_map()
 51    {}
 52
 53
 54  // Accessors.
 55public:
 56  // Information on individual distributions.
 57  distribution_type distribution     (dimension_type dim) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 58    { return map_.distribution(parent_dim(dim)); }
 59
 60  length_type       num_subblocks    (dimension_type dim) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 61    { return map_.num_subblock(parent_dim(dim)); }
 62
 63  length_type       cyclic_contiguity(dimension_type dim) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 64    { return map_.cyclic_contiguity(parent_dim(dim)); }
 65
 66  length_type num_subblocks()  const VSIP_NOTHROW
 67    { return map_.num_subblocks(); }
 68
 69  length_type num_processors() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 70    { return map_.num_processors(); }
 71
 72  index_type subblock(processor_type pr) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 73    { return map_.subblock(pr); }
 74
 75  index_type subblock() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 76    { return map_.subblock(); }
 77
 78  processor_iterator processor_begin(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 79    { return map_.processor_begin(sb); }
 80
 81  processor_iterator processor_end  (index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 82    { return map_.processor_end(sb); }
 83
 84  const_Vector<processor_type> processor_set() const;
 85
 86  // Applied map functions.
 87public:
 88  length_type impl_num_patches(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 89    { return map_.impl_num_patches(sb); }
 90
 91  void impl_apply(Domain<Dim> const& /*dom*/) VSIP_NOTHROW
 92  {
 93    // TODO assert(extent(dom_) == transpose(extent(dom)));
 94  }
 95
 96  template <dimension_type Dim2>
 97  Domain<Dim2> impl_subblock_domain(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 98  {
 99    assert(sb < this->num_subblocks());
100    Domain<Dim2> p_dom = map_.template impl_subblock_domain<Dim2>(sb);
101    return Domain<Dim2>(p_dom[1], p_dom[0]);
102  }
103
104  template <dimension_type Dim2>
105  impl::Length<Dim2> impl_subblock_extent(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
106  {
107    assert(sb < this->num_subblocks());
108    impl::Length<Dim2> p_ext = map_.template impl_subblock_extent<Dim2>(sb);
109    return impl::Length<Dim2>(p_ext[1], p_ext[0]);
110  }
111
112  template <dimension_type Dim2>
113  Domain<Dim2> impl_global_domain(index_type sb, index_type p)
114    const VSIP_NOTHROW
115  {
116    assert(sb < this->num_subblocks());
117    assert(p  < this->impl_num_patches(sb));
118    Domain<Dim2> p_dom = map_.template impl_global_domain<Dim2>(sb, p);
119    return Domain<Dim2>(p_dom[1], p_dom[0]);
120  }
121
122  template <dimension_type Dim2>
123  Domain<Dim2> impl_local_domain (index_type sb, index_type p)
124    const VSIP_NOTHROW
125  {
126    assert(sb < this->num_subblocks());
127    assert(p  < this->impl_num_patches(sb));
128    Domain<Dim2> p_dom = map_.template impl_local_domain<Dim2>(sb, p);
129    return Domain<Dim2>(p_dom[1], p_dom[0]);
130  }
131
132  template <dimension_type Dim2>
133  Domain<Dim2> impl_parent_local_domain(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
134  {
135    assert(sb < this->num_subblocks());
136    Domain<Dim2> p_dom = map_.template impl_parent_local_domain<Dim2>(sb);
137    return Domain<Dim2>(p_dom[1], p_dom[0]);
138  }
139
140  index_type impl_global_from_local_index(dimension_type /*d*/, index_type sb,
141				     index_type idx)
142    const VSIP_NOTHROW
143  {
144    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(impl::unimplemented(
145	      "Transpose_map::impl_global_from_local_index not implemented."));
146    return 0;
147  }
148
149  index_type impl_local_from_global_index(dimension_type dim, index_type idx)
150    const VSIP_NOTHROW
151  { return map_.impl_local_from_global_index(parent_dim(dim), idx); }
152
153  template <dimension_type Dim2>
154  index_type impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<Dim2> const& /*idx*/)
155    const VSIP_NOTHROW
156  {
157    VSIP_IMPL_THROW(impl::unimplemented(
158	      "Transpose_map::impl_subblock_from_global_index not implemented."));
159    return 0;
160  }
161
162  template <dimension_type Dim2>
163  Domain<Dim> impl_local_from_global_domain(index_type sb,
164					    Domain<Dim2> const& dom)
165    const VSIP_NOTHROW
166  {
167    VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT(Dim == Dim2);
168    Domain<Dim> p_gdom(dom[1], dom[0]);
169    Domain<Dim> p_ldom = map_.template impl_local_from_global_domain<Dim2>
170                                        (sb, p_gdom);
171    return Domain<Dim>(p_ldom[1], p_ldom[0]);
172  }
173
174  // Extensions.
175public:
176  impl::par_ll_pset_type impl_ll_pset() const VSIP_NOTHROW
177    { return map_.impl_ll_pset(); }
178
179  impl::Communicator&    impl_comm() const
180    { return map_.impl_comm(); }
181
182  impl_pvec_type const&  impl_pvec() const
183    { return map_.impl_pvec(); }
184
185  length_type            impl_working_size() const
186    { return map_.impl_working_size(); }
187
188  processor_type         impl_proc_from_rank(index_type idx) const
189    { return map_.impl_proc_from_rank(idx); }
190
191  index_type impl_rank_from_proc(processor_type pr) const
192    { return map_.impl_rank_from_proc(pr); }
193
194  // Determine parent map subblock corresponding to this map's subblock
195  index_type impl_parent_subblock(index_type sb) const
196    { return map_.impl_parent_subblock(sb); }
197
198public:
199  typedef std::vector<Domain<Dim> >   p_vector_type;
200  typedef std::vector<p_vector_type>  sb_vector_type;
201
202
203  // Member data.
204private:
205  MapT const& map_;
206};
207
208
209
210/// Specialize global traits for Global_map.
211
212template <typename MapT>
213struct Is_global_map<Transpose_map<MapT> >
214{ static bool const value = true; };
215
216
217
218/***********************************************************************
219  Transpose_map_of
220***********************************************************************/
221
222// Functor to transpose a map.
223//
224// Handles both the type conversion ('type') and the runtime
225// conversion ('project').
226
227template <dimension_type Dim,
228	  typename       MapT>
229struct Transpose_map_of
230{
231  typedef Transpose_map<MapT> type;
232
233  static type project(MapT const& map)
234    { return type(map); }
235};
236
237
238
239// Specialization for Local_map.
240
241template <dimension_type Dim>
242struct Transpose_map_of<Dim, Local_map>
243{
244  typedef Local_map type;
245
246  static type project(Local_map const& map)
247    { return map; }
248};
249
250
